 22namespace fft

 24
 25/// Determine whether the FFT size is a power of two.
 26inline bool 
 27is_power_of_two(unsigned size)
 28{
 29  return (size & (size - 1)) == 0;
 30}
 31template <dimension_type D>
 32inline bool 
 33is_power_of_two(Domain<D> const &dom)
 34{
 35  for (dimension_type d = 0; d != D; ++d)
 36    if (!is_power_of_two(dom[d].size())) return false;
 37  return true;
 38}
 39
 40/// Determine the exponent (forward or inverse) of a given Fft
 41/// from its parameters.
 42template <typename I, typename O, int sD> struct exponent;
 43template <typename T, int sD>
 44struct exponent<T, std::complex<T>, sD> { static int const value = -1;};
 45template <typename T, int sD>
 46struct exponent<std::complex<T>, T, sD> { static int const value = 1;};
 47template <typename T>
 48struct exponent<T, T, -2> { static int const value = -1;};
 49template <typename T>
 50struct exponent<T, T, -1> { static int const value = 1;};
 51
 52/// Determine the 'special dimension' of a real fft
 53/// from its parameters.
 54template <typename I, typename O, int S> 
 55struct axis { static int const value = S;};
 56template <typename T, int S>
 57struct axis<T, T, S> { static int const value = 0;};
 58
 59/// Device to calculate the size of the input and output blocks
 60/// for complex and real ffts.
 61template <dimension_type D, typename I, typename O, int A>
 62struct io_size
 63{
 64  static Domain<D> size(Domain<D> const &dom) { return dom;}
 65};
 66template <dimension_type D, typename T, int A>
 67struct io_size<D, std::complex<T>, T, A>
 68{
 69  static Domain<D> size(Domain<D> const &dom) 
 70  {
 71    Domain<D> retn(dom);
 72    Domain<1> &mod = retn.impl_at(A);
 73    mod = Domain<1>(0, 1, mod.size() / 2 + 1); 
 74    return retn;
 75  }
 76};
 77
 78
 79template <typename View>
 80View
 81new_view(vsip::Domain<1> const& dom) { return View(dom.size());} 
 82
 83template <typename View>
 84View 
 85new_view(vsip::Domain<2> const& dom)
 86{ return View(dom[0].size(), dom[1].size());}
 87
 88template <typename View>
 89View  
 90new_view(vsip::Domain<3> const& dom)
 91{ return View(dom[0].size(), dom[1].size(), dom[2].size());}
 92
 93
 94
 95template <typename View>
 96View
 97new_view(
 98  vsip::Domain<1> const&                     dom,
 99  typename View::block_type::map_type const& map)
100{ return View(dom.size(), map);} 
101
102template <typename View>
103View 
104new_view(
105  vsip::Domain<2> const&                     dom,
106  typename View::block_type::map_type const& map)
107{ return View(dom[0].size(), dom[1].size(), map);}
108
109template <typename View>
110View  
111new_view(
112  vsip::Domain<3> const&                     dom,
113  typename View::block_type::map_type const& map)
114{ return View(dom[0].size(), dom[1].size(), dom[2].size(), map);}
115
116
117
118/// Traits class to determine block type returned by Fft and Fftm
119/// by_value operators.
120template<typename T,
121	 typename BlockT,
122	 typename MapT = typename BlockT::map_type>
123struct result
124{
125  static dimension_type const dim = BlockT::dim;
126  typedef typename
127  impl::Strided<dim, T, 
128		Layout<dim, tuple<0,1,2>,
129		       impl::Stride_unit_dense,
130		       typename Block_layout<BlockT>::complex_type>,
131		MapT> block_type;
132
133  typedef typename View_of_dim<dim, T, block_type>::type view_type;
134
135  static view_type create(Domain<dim> const &dom, MapT const& map)
136  { return new_view<view_type>(dom, map);}
137};
138
139#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
140
141/// Traits class to determine view type returned by Fft for
142/// by_value operators with return-block optimization.
143template <dimension_type Dim,
144	  typename       InT,
145	  typename       OutT,
146	  typename       ViewT,
147	  typename       WorkspaceT,
148	  int            S>
149struct Result_rbo
150{
151  typedef vsip_csl::expr::op::fft<Dim,
152				  fft::Fft_backend<Dim, InT, OutT, S>,
153				  WorkspaceT> traits;
154  typedef typename traits::template Functor<typename ViewT::block_type> functor_type;
155  typedef expr::Unary<traits::template Functor, typename ViewT::block_type> block_type;
156  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, OutT, block_type const>::type view_type;
157};
158
159
160
161template <typename       InT,
162	  typename       OutT,
163	  typename       BlockT,
164	  typename       WorkspaceT,
165	  int            Axis,
166	  int            Direction>
167struct Result_fftm_rbo
168{
169  static dimension_type const dim = 2;
170  typedef const_Matrix<InT, BlockT> in_view_type;
171  typedef vsip_csl::expr::op::fft<dim, fft::Fftm_backend<InT, OutT, Axis, Direction>,
172				  WorkspaceT> traits;
173  typedef typename traits::template Functor<BlockT> functor_type;
174  typedef expr::Unary<traits::template Functor, BlockT> block_type;
175  typedef typename View_of_dim<dim, OutT, block_type const>::type view_type;
176};
177
178#endif
